item.title: Talking about research
item.description: As someone who spends most of their life elbow deep in research, it’s sometimes hard to take a step back and view what you’re doing from the outside. I’m pretty happy with my ability to communicate our work to a scientific audience. It’s something I’ve been trained (and have trained myself)Â to do over the last five or six years and so is something I find quite easy. The thought of having to explain what I do to a conference audience, or to the project partners in a meeting is something that I know I can cope with.
